Module gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core
Package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark

Class FlexmarkFactory

java.lang.Object
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.FlexmarkFactory
public final class FlexmarkFactory extends Object
Provides factory methods for Flexmark processing to support HTML-to-markdown and markdown-to-HTML conversion.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.FlexmarkHtmlConverter
    getFlexmarkHtmlConverter()
    Get the Flexmark HTML converter, which can produce markdown from HTML content.
    com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.Formatter
    getFormatter()
    Get the Flexmark formatter, which can produce markdown from a markdown syntax tree.
    com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlRenderer
    getHtmlRenderer()
    Get the Flexmark HTML renderer, which can produce HTML from a markdown syntax tree.
    com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.ListOptions
    getListOptions()
    Get configured options for processing HTML and markdown lists.
    com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.Parser
    getMarkdownParser()
    Get the Flexmark markdown parser, which can produce a markdown syntax tree.
    static FlexmarkFactory
    instance()
    Get the static Flexmark factory instance.
    static FlexmarkFactory
    newInstance(com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.DataHolder config)
    Get a Flexmark factory instance that uses the provided Flexmark configuration.
